>[__flexdashboards__](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/webinars/introducing-flexdashboards) allow users to create R dashboards using Markdown

##[__Fiji Earthquakes__](http://bluegranite.github.io/FlexDashboards/earthquakes.html)

_Fiji Earthquakes_ is a sample R flexdashboard showing data from the R _quakes_ dataset. It uses Leaflet, ThreeJS, and ggvis.
